title: HELP ASAP PLZ <3
body:
so basically i updated LoL with the new client beta and it all went smoothly....i then pressed launch and than it goes to my pc back ground and does nothing.....if i try to re open LoL it says there is already one open and than the LoL page turns fully black...i even uninstalled lol and reinstalled it


PLZ HELP ME <3

Aussie

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some sort of network or weak connection problem that's causing your patcher to load up with a black screen.  It can't download or grab any assets so everything remains black.  As a first step, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good shape.  

What happens if you attempt to launch the regular live client, and does it still result in a black screen?  C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin.exe

Also, give it some time and wait for the patcher to load on it's own without trying to reopen it.  Let me know how that works out for you!
thanks for helping !! i used the C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin.exetihng and that worked <3 thanks so much ahah

have you tried (on windows) ctrl+shift+esc to open up the task menu and removing the existing lol.exe applications ? 

That sometimes solves the problem with the new client unable to launch.
thanks for the help man! its all good now <3
